name: Sanities Lament Episode 3
description:
Notes:

If using the exe play at 1024x768 Windowed for optiminal UI. Having trouble loading? Try with FireFox.

You are trapped by a strange entity that toys with you and you must try to help your friends escape. A nightmare? A dream? Or reality. Trying to manage your high school life and friends in between dreams.

Weeklyish-series, if you enjoy or would like to see more please consider tipping.

Cheers,

Endemic
